metadata.name: Renamed AutoHotkey.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of a renamed autohotkey.exe binary based on PE metadata fields

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(metadata.product.name), lower('autohotkey')) AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('autohotkey')) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('autohotkey\.exe', 'autohotkey\.rc')) AND NOT ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey32_uia.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey64_uia.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeya32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeya32_uia.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeyu32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeyu32_uia.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeyu64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkeyu64_uia.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\autohotkey'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of a renamed autohotkey.exe binary based on PE metadata fields
